description:
The boys are suddenly art experts when word gets out a few girls in class are models for a mature-audiences-only exhibit! Later, it’s a perfect day for a wedding - but who’s the lucky couple? And why is Akira wearing the groom’s tuxedo?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dreams for Art! / Fantasy Wedding! / Wish on a Star!
Ein Traum von Kunst. Ein Gebet an die Götter. Ein Wunsch an die Sterne.
Geijutsu ni Yume o! / Kami ni Chikai o! / Hoshi ni Negai o!
芸術に夢を! / 神に誓いを! / 星に願いを!
